channel.title: Will GTAIV PC work?
channel.description:
Will GTAIV PC work on my PC?
I have checked the requirements, and my computer beats all the recommended requirements, except for the CPU, which does not even meet the minimum.
Will this game still work, or will I need to get a better cpu?
+ My CPU did not meet assassin's creed requirements, but the game still played.

item.title: Will GTAIV PC work?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

The problems most people are having with the game are CPU, its a very CPU intensive game.

I wouldn’t bet on it. Torrent it and try before you buy.

Read full topic

item.title: Will GTAIV PC work?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“runescape3dude, post:7, topic:250553”]AMD 64 3500+ 2.2GHZ } fails
2x80gb hdd } recommended
1x200GB hdd} Meets recommended
2GB ddr2 800 ram } recommended
8600GT } meets recommended[/quote]
I have no idea what AMD processors are like, I only know how intel chips are.
2GB ram and 8600GT should run it fine though. Just not sure on your processor.

Read full topic
